title: Word on the beat
summary: Lewis Hamilton’s dejected comments after qualifying and then the race at the Hungaroring – when he described his performances as “useless” and that Ferrari probably needs “a new driver” –…

qa_pairs.question: Which driver expressed disappointment in their performance during the Hungarian Grand Prix weekend?
What did Lewis Hamilton suggest about Ferrari's driver situation after the race at the Hungaroring?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Ferrari probably needs a new driver
wrong_options: Ferrari should change their technical team
Ferrari should focus on engine upgrades

qa_pairs.question: In what context did Hamilton describe his performances as 'useless'?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: After qualifying and the race at the Hungaroring
wrong_options: During the team meeting before the race
